properties.entry: SELECT B.BOOK_NO, BOOK_USER_NAME, BOOK_PERSONNEL, B.BOOK_CHECK_DATE, BOOK_CHECKOUT_DATE, BOOK_APPROVE_YN, BOOK_STATUS_YNC, BOOK_CHECK_IN, REQUEST, R.ROOM_NO, R.ROOM_NAME, R.ROOM_FEE, A.ACCOMO_NAME, U.USER_PHONE FROM BOOK_LIST B JOIN ROOM_INFO R ON(B.ROOM_NO = R.ROOM_NO) JOIN ACCOMO_INFO A ON(R.ACCOMO_NO = A.ACCOMO_NO) JOIN USER_INFO U ON(B.USER_NO = U.USER_NO) WHERE A.OWNER_NO = ? AND BOOK_APPROVE_YN = 'N' AND BOOK_STATUS_YNC = 'Y'

SELECT B.BOOK_NO, BOOK_USER_NAME, BOOK_PERSONNEL, B.BOOK_CHECK_DATE, BOOK_CHECKOUT_DATE, BOOK_APPROVE_YN, BOOK_CHECK_IN, REQUEST, R.ROOM_NO, R.ROOM_NAME, R.ROOM_FEE, /* 일자 계산해서 넣기 */ A.ACCOMO_NAME, U.USER_ID, U.USER_PHONE, P.PAYMENT_TIME, P.PAYMENT_METHOD FROM BOOK_LIST B JOIN ROOM_INFO R ON(B.ROOM_NO = R.ROOM_NO) JOIN ACCOMO_INFO A ON(R.ACCOMO_NO = A.ACCOMO_NO) JOIN USER_INFO U ON(B.USER_NO = U.USER_NO) JOIN PAYMENT P ON(B.BOOK_NO = P.BOOK_NO) WHERE B.BOOK_NO = ?

SELECT B.BOOK_NO, BOOK_USER_NAME, BOOK_PERSONNEL, B.BOOK_CHECK_DATE, BOOK_CHECKOUT_DATE, BOOK_APPROVE_YN, BOOK_STATUS_YNC, BOOK_CHECK_IN, REQUEST, R.ROOM_NO, R.ROOM_NAME, R.ROOM_FEE, A.ACCOMO_NAME, U.USER_PHONE, U.USER_NO, A.OWNER_NO FROM BOOK_LIST B JOIN ROOM_INFO R ON(B.ROOM_NO = R.ROOM_NO) JOIN ACCOMO_INFO A ON(R.ACCOMO_NO = A.ACCOMO_NO) JOIN USER_INFO U ON(B.USER_NO = U.USER_NO) WHERE A.OWNER_NO = ? AND BOOK_APPROVE_YN = 'Y' OR BOOK_STATUS_YNC = 'N' OR BOOK_STATUS_YNC = 'C'
UPDATE BOOK_LIST SET BOOK_APPROVE_YN = 'Y' WHERE BOOK_NO = ?
INSERT INTO BOOK_HISTORY VALUES ( ? , SYSDATE , 'Y' , null , SEQ_HISTORYNO.NEXTVAL )
UPDATE BOOK_LIST SET BOOK_STATUS_YNC = 'N' WHERE BOOK_NO = ?
UPDATE BOOK_LIST SET BOOK_APPROVE_YN = 'Y' WHERE BOOK_NO = ?
INSERT INTO BOOK_HISTORY VALUES ( ? , SYSDATE , 'N' , ? , SEQ_HISTORYNO.NEXTVAL )

SELECT E.RNUM , E.OWNER_QNA_NO , E.OWNER_QNA_TITLE , E.OWNER_QNA_CONTENT , E.OWNER_QNA_DATE , E.OWNER_ANSWER_YN , E.ACCOMO_NO , E.USER_NICKNAME FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , D.OWNER_QNA_NO , D.OWNER_QNA_TITLE , D.OWNER_QNA_CONTENT , D.OWNER_QNA_DATE , D.OWNER_ANSWER_YN , D.ACCOMO_NO , D.USER_NICKNAME FROM(SELECT A.OWNER_QNA_NO , A.OWNER_QNA_TITLE , A.OWNER_QNA_CONTENT , A.OWNER_QNA_DATE , A.OWNER_ANSWER_YN , A.ACCOMO_NO , B.USER_NICKNAME FROM OWNER_QNA A, USER_INFO B, ACCOMO_INFO C WHERE A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO AND C.ACCOMO_NO = A.ACCOMO_NO AND C.OWNER_NO = ? ORDER BY OWNER_QNA_NO DESC)D )E WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM OWNER_QNA A, USER_INFO B, ACCOMO_INFO C WHERE A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO AND C.ACCOMO_NO = A.ACCOMO_NO AND C.OWNER_NO = ? ORDER BY OWNER_QNA_NO DESC
SELECT A.OWNER_QNA_TITLE , A.OWNER_QNA_DATE , B.USER_NICKNAME , A.OWNER_QNA_CONTENT FROM OWNER_QNA A, USER_INFO B WHERE A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO AND A.OWNER_QNA_NO = ?
INSERT INTO OWNER_ANSWER ( OWNER_ANSWER_NO , OWNER_ANSWER_CONTENT , OWNER_ANSWER_DATE , OWNER_QNA_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_OWNER_ANSWER_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , SYSDATE , ? )
SELECT A.OWNER_ANSWER_CONTENT , A.OWNER_ANSWER_DATE FROM OWNER_ANSWER A, OWNER_QNA B WHERE B.OWNER_QNA_NO = ? AND A.OWNER_QNA_NO = ?
